did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Susan Fenimore Cooper Letters, Accession # 6245-z, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift from Clifton Waller Barrett on 8 November 1973.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains two letters written by Susan Fenimore Cooper, November 10, 1854 to "My dear Commodore" [William Branford Shubrick] from Geneva; and January 15, 1875, to Mary Clymer.

did.unittitle: Letter from Susan Fenimore Cooper to "My Dear Commodore" [William Branford Shubrick] 10 November 1854

scopecontent.p: Susan Fenimore Cooper to "My Dear Commodore" [William Branford Shubrick], including a copy of the title page of The Rhyme and Reason of Country Life.

did.unittitle: Letter from Susan Fenimore Cooper to Mary Clymer [Mrs. Shubrick Clymer] 14 January 1875
